name: Wildfire (itch) (GildarGaming)
description:
Your goal is to keep the fires at bay as long as possible.

Use WASD to control the fire truck :)

Space to use your water cannon 

An additional option will show up as a button if you get enough money...

Go straight to the WebGL build here: https://games.gildargaming.net/LD50/

Updated WebGL version that fixes a missing visual queue for hitting fires:  https://games.gildargaming.net/LD50v2/
